vulnerability.description: App bander.notepad puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = TitleEdit)) on an unsafe sink (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (bander.notepad.TitleEdit). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App fr.xgouchet.texteditor puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = TedWidgetConfigActivity)) on an unsafe sink (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (fr.xgouchet.texteditor.TedWidgetConfigActivity). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App com.doomy.torch puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = WidgetActivity)) on an unsafe sink (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (com.doomy.torch.WidgetActivity). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App fr.xgouchet.texteditor puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = TedActivity)) on an unsafe sink (LOG) in one of its components (fr.xgouchet.texteditor.TedActivity). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App bander.notepad sends an Implicit Intent (Action = hasValue, Category = android_intent_category_DEFAULT, Data=) containing sensitive data (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (bander.notepad.NoteEdit). A malicious app can receive the Intent, and send its data via an Explicit Intent (Component = WidgetActivity) to app com.doomy.torch that puts this data on an unsafe output (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (com.doomy.torch.WidgetActivity).

element.description: Implicit Intent (Action = hasValue, Category = android_intent_category_DEFAULT, Data=)
